alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 11:55AM EDT until April 03 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding occurs at several camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 7.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
